title: Mouse Cursor problems
body:
Idk lately around the last patch my cursor on league has been absolutely atrocious, its like it skips an inch about every 10th click.
I've tried multiple mice but the problem remains.
It works fine in lobby and in other games...

Just wondering if anyone has had the same problem?

Ty for reading cheers :)

replies.body:
Unless there is a problem with the hardware itself, your settings could be corrupt.  A reset could help here:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
